transcript:
Customer: O bhi 25 ki hai.
Hellow?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mohan ji namaskar.
Customer: Ji namaste.
Executive: Mohan ji Sumit baat kar raha hu sir mai IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya sir.
Executive: Ji ji sir actually kal maine baat isliye kiya jo hamari form chal rahi hai Ashutosh Agro Chemicals and Biofertilizer Private Limited. Sir actually sir aapka discussion Ankit ji ke sath hua tha to kuch apne concerns vagera bheja tha unko ki fir koi buyer aapke pass aaya tha kuch ye gem portal se related aapne usko payment kar di thi right na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hai na? To maine basically call isliye kiya tha ki wo apne apni side se to fir bhi ek bar apni legal team ko aapne forward kar diya tha concern vagera to shayad unhone aaj aapko kuch mail bhi bheja hoga screenshot ke liye aur shayad us buyer ko bhi mail pe bhi unhone bheja hai number pe bhi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To baki mai bas ye puchna chah raha tha ki aapne apna fir bhi apni side se cyber mein ya bank mein apna wo karwa diya concern vagera raise fir bhi ek bar safe side se.
Customer: Cyber mein maine call kiya tha 1930 mein unhone keh diya abhi hamara portal kharab chal raha hai abhi koi shikat darj nahi hogi.
Executive: Achcha. To sir aap ek kam karo agar aisa kuch hai na to agar wo koi cheez hai to online bhi cyber cell ki website hai us website pe ja ke normally aap.
Customer: Cyber cell ki website pe humne dala tha jab usko proceed kar rahe hain us time.
Executive: Haan. Jis time wo upload hota hai submit hota hai us time back ho jata hai waha tak to pura bhar dete submit ka submit ke baad mein fir khatam ho jata hai pura ka pura.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay koi nahi sir ek bar aap karke dekh lijiye kabhi ho jata hai kya pata us samay kam chal raha ho ticket pe bilkul aap sahi baat keh rahe ho waha pe us samay ho jata hai cheezon ko leke. Ek bar fir bhi apna side se kar ke dekh lijiye baki dekho humne apni side se to ek bar for a time safe side apni apni legal team ko to bhej hi diya hai to wo bhi ek bar aapse bhi aur usse dono se connect karne ka try karegi cheezon ko leke. Cheezon waha se aapko help out mil paye cheezon ko leke. Baki cyber cell ka kaun se number pe aapne kiya tha sir 1930 pe na?
Customer: 1930 pe kiya tha us pe kiya tha www.cyber.gov.in pe.
Executive: Haan cybercrime.gov.in pe bilkul bilkul wahi hai. Haan wahi hai apna.
Customer: To us pe bhi submit nahi ho paya aur us pe call unhone utha liya tha call bhi receive ki thi par unhone keh diya ki hum aapki darj nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Achcha. www.cyber.com pe kar dijiye to us pe kiya tha us pe jab last ko pure form fill karne ke baad me sari inquiry bhar dete hain aur payment vement sara kuch jab last me proceed karte hain jab back ho jata hai.
Customer: Haan. Ye ho raha hai.
Executive: Okay. To ye aapne kal matlab raat me kiya tha ya din me kar rahe the?
Customer: Nahi kal kal sham ko hi kiya tha kareeb 4 baje ke lagbhag.
Executive: Achcha achcha koi nahi sir ek bar aap kar ke dekh lijiyega sir kabhi kabhi ho jata hai ya to iske backend se kuch kam vam chal raha ho ya kuch update. Ek bar dobara karwa ke dekh leta hu.
Executive: Haan haan apne aap agar laptop se laga hoga to mobile se apna kar lijiyega aisa kuch hoga. Baki meri team to wo jo humse hai wo to ek bar aapko try karegi connect karne ka baki apna bank se bhi apna wo cheez. Kyunki sir dekho frankly batau kabhi bhi na sir ek dam se mat dena kyunki aage ke liye aap to sir dekho itna bada business apna chala rahe ho cheezon ko leke na to. Meri pehli baat ye hai agar hamare pass us pe IndiaMART nahi likha aata na to hum itne chutiya nahi hai ki hum kisi ke paise dalne waise hi usme inquiry IndiaMART se aayi.
Executive: Ji dekho bilkul sir dekho IndiaMART se ek buyer aaya bilkul agree karta hu lekin ek cheez hai ki wo buyer aaya hai aur koi bhi aap apni buyer ke sath dealing karte ho to sir hum to khud bolte hain aap apni terms and condition ke base pe karna koi bhi cheez bhai kyunki agar wo batata mai gem portal ka registration kar leta to sir usse sabse pehle na apni bhai wo bolte the bhai aap kis company se baat kar raha bhai kahan pe registration ka kuch bana rakha aapne zara document to bhejo. Ka naam bhi bataya tha na ofcon private limited company LLB karke aur us pe google pe search mar rahe hain to aa raha hai naam bhi uska.
Executive: To wahi hai. IndiaMART pe registered hai wo company.
Executive: To tabhi to sir humne bhi aapka concern raise kar ke aage dala hai ki wo agar hamare pass hai to kis kis naam se hai kar ke hai isliye mai bol raha hu cheezon ko to humne safe side apni side se apne jo bhi aapne naam bataya apni safe side kar liya cheezon ko connect karne ke liye. To bhaiya wahi hai ki aage chale koi dikkat na pade is cheez ko leke. Baki aapke pass meri legal team ne shayad mail bhi kiya hoga aapki mail id pe usko jo bhi wo cheez mangegi apne aap.
Customer: Man liya humne baat. Mere to actually baat kya hai 40000 ka mera to aapke yaha registration hua hai aaj tak teen mahine char mahine ho gaye 40 paise ka to business mujhe mila nahi IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ab tak 40 paise ka business nahi mila IndiaMART se itni badi badi baaten karte the aap is time se pehle sir ek cheez batao sir ek cheez bana denge hum ye karenge hum wo karenge sala wo sab fraud nikla aap bhi fraud ho wo to fraud jo hamare sath 15000 ka kar gaya wo bhi IndiaMART sir ek cheez batao sir ek cheez batao aapne is mahine kitni inquiry use kari hai sir?
Executive: Sir ek cheez batao.
Customer: Kitni bhi inquiry kar lo yaar inquiry fraud hi aa rahi hai na sabhi inquiry jo bhi inquiry aati hai aapko agar phone karoge.
Executive: Sir bina use kare. Sir ji ek cheez batao bina use kare. Are suno bina use nahi maine use bhi kiya hai. Use karne ke baad me main jo waha se inquiry aati hai us number pe phone lagata hu uske pass puchta hu kya ji aapne inquiry kari wo keh deta nahi nahi humne koi inquiry nahi kari ji. Achcha. Fir puchte hain dusre ko phone kar ke ji aapne koi inquiry kari nahi nahi ji humne to koi inquiry nahi kari yaar ab tumhari team hi aisi baithi hai jo farji becho apne aap inquiry number dal rahe hain le.
Executive: Sir ek cheez mere ko batao sir aisa nahi hai farji baithi hai sir har cheez buyer ke number hume thodi na pata chal ja rahe hain buyer ke number kya hai uski requirement kya hai sir. Buyer ke number nahi pata chal rahe to buyer ko jab main phone kar raha hu jab to buyer yahi nahi keh raha maine inquiry dala hai. To sir ye cheez buyer se pucho bhai aapne requirement dali kya fir IndiaMART pe mere pass kaise aayi requirement aap kisi buyer se pucho to. IndiaMART dekhega na IndiaMART pehle connect kare us buyer ko pehle IndiaMART usko phone kar ke puche bhai aapko kya chahiye kya chahiye to fir aapko sir ji itna agar aapko doubt rehta hai aap as a buyer ban ke kabhi koi apni requirement dalo to aapko khud pata chalega aapke pass calls aati hai sari cheeze puchi jati hai nahi puchi jati hai sir as a buyer kabhi ban ke aap aise requirement to dalo aapko dikhega waha pe wo sir IndiaMART ki buyer list ke through opportunity aapko provide nahi karwa ke de raha hai sir calls ke through bhi convert karta hai jo buyer aapki profile pe direct message aake inquiry dalta hai wo bhi hai.
Customer: Sir ji main to pura kar ke main to pura kar ke dekh liya phone bhi kar ke dekh liye buy lead bhi dekh liye. Sir ji phone karne ki baat nahi kar raha hu mujhe kahin. Sir ji phone karne. Phone karne ki baat nahi kar raha hu jo buyer ne phone aapko kiya hai sir mai unki baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Mere pass koi bhi phone phone nahi aaya aaj tak 10 call panch call do call shuru se last tak. Ab tak koi call aayi hai baki kuch nahi aaya.
Executive: Haan to sir to mai bata to raha hu call ke through buyer aata hai. IndiaMART se usne machodi meri 15000 kha gaya yahi to kal ye bhi to buyer hi tha. To sir aapne trust kar ke usko diya ab ek cheez bataiye aaj bhi to aapke pass ek kal inquiry aayi hai. kiya tha tumhari team daily koi na koi meri gand me ungli de raha hai sir aap lead kyu nahi lete sir aap lead kyu nahi lete sir aap lead kyu nahi lete. Sir language nahi nahi maine le leta hu. Sir language thoda sahi se baat kariye.
Customer: Sir language.
Executive: To sir isme isme employee ki kahan pe galti aa gayi sir aap us pe trust kar ke turant ek dam payment bhej rahe ho usse pehle trust to aap hi ne kara na us buyer pe. Wo buyer humne humne us pe trust nahi kiya humne IndiaMART pe trust kiya IndiaMART ki baat ho rahi thi us pe likha aa raha tha IndiaMART inquiry.
Customer: Achcha. To sir pehle na tone sir jo aap lehze me baat kar rahe ho na sir thoda sa professional way me aake baat karo. Haan phone katiye mujhe jarurat nahi hai IndiaMART ki aur na hi aapki.
Executive: Achcha. Phone connect karo aap apna bilkul kato phone abhi.
Executive: Sir ji to discuss karoge tabhi to koi cheez ka resolution milega jis tone me aap baat kar rahe ho. jarurat na tumhari na tumhare IndiaMART ki kato phone abhi.
Executive: Thik hai sir ji. Bina uske to.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer lost money to a fraudulent buyer.

- Feels IndiaMART is also a fraud.

- Not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Inquiries are fraudulent.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of raising concerns.

- Executive mentioned legal team will connect.

- Executive advised to file cyber complaint.

- Executive advised to check as a buyer.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer disconnected the call.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, fraud, buyleads, cyber complaint
